body: It's hot and I really love this original series. @Akudi: if you want other artists' work to be translated, stop whining and do it yourself, ok?

@Akudi : i think this is the eng official ver. since we got to read it from left to right
idk though, just guessing. but yes i'm with you

I see this, and I think: Let me get this straight. Translators can spend time translating entire yaoi collections, but they don't translate good artists who entire work collection is untranslated? It's not fair, man...
